The Gross Domestic Product ( GDP ) refers to the market value of all final goods and services produced within a country in a given period.
According to the CBO , the United States GDP will increase steadily over the next decade from 21.22 trillion U.S. dollars in 2019 to 32 trillion U.S. dollars in 2030 .
